properties.entry: SELECT COUNT (*) AS COUNT FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY_SUB WHERE P_CATEGORY_NO = (SELECT P_CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY_PARENT WHERE P_CATEGORY_NAME = ? )
INSERT INTO PRODUCT( BRAND_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, COMPANY_PRICE, CATEGORY_NO, PRODUCT_GENDER, PRODUCT_WEATHER ) VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO STOCK( STOCK_NO, USER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, STOCK, P_SIZE, USER_CLASS, STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_STOCK_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 1 )
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_DETAIL( PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT ) VALUES( ?, ? )
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_IMG( IMG_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH ) VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCT_INO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, COMPANY_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT_IMG WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND IMG_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, COMPANY_PRICE, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = PI.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE BRAND_NAME = ? AND PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM PRODUCT_DETAIL WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ?
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, SUM(STOCK) AS STOCK FROM STOCK WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME
SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_NAME) AS PRODUCT_NAME FROM WISHLIST WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ?
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, P_SIZE FROM STOCK WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND STATUS = '1' GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME, P_SIZE ORDER BY P_SIZE ASC

SELECT * FROM(SELECT STOCK_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, P_SIZE, STOCK, PRICE, USER_CLASS FROM STOCK WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND P_SIZE = ? AND USER_CLASS = 1 AND STATUS = '1') WHERE ROWNUM = 1 UNION SELECT * FROM(SELECT STOCK_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, P_SIZE, STOCK, PRICE, USER_CLASS FROM STOCK WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND P_SIZE = ? AND USER_CLASS = 2 AND STATUS = '1' ORDER BY PRICE ASC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
INSERT INTO WISHLIST( USER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME ) VALUES ( ?, ? )
DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PRODUCT_NAME = ?

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND CS.P_CATEGORY_NO = ( SELECT P_CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY_PARENT WHERE P_CATEGORY_NAME = ? ) GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND CS.P_CATEGORY_NO = ( SELECT P_CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY_PARENT WHERE P_CATEGORY_NAME = ? ) GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME = ? GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_GENDER = ? GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_PRICE < 100000 GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_PRICE BETWEEN 100000 AND 300000 GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_PRICE BETWEEN 300000 AND 500000 GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_PRICE BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000 GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_PRICE BETWEEN 1000000 AND 3000000 GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPANY_PRICE > 3000000 GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P_SIZE = ? GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE
INSERT INTO CART( CART_NO, USER_ID, STOCK_NO, CART_COUNT ) VALUES( SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE ? GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE
INSERT INTO STOCK( STOCK_NO, USER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, STOCK, P_SIZE, USER_CLASS, STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_STOCK_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0 )
SELECT BRAND_NAME FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY BRAND_NAME

SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT O ON S.STOCK_NO = O.STOCK_NO LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB CS ON CS.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_PARENT CP ON CP.P_CATEGORY_NO = CS.P_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.BRAND_NAME = ? GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE
